fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Premium Kit
fields.description: Pika Pika Rain PREMIUM KIT Ceramic Coating forms a 100% genuine-glass coating [ ceramic coating ] on your car body by reacting with moisture in the air. Once cured, the glass layer protects the car body for up to 3 years. The glass coating [ ceramic coating ] layer produces a luxurious gloss and provides excellent water repellency on your car body.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Deluxe
fields.description: 5 Yrs Durability. Pika Pika Rain DELUXE Ceramic Coating is developed for customers who treasure their cars. It is the very best quality coating only for professionals! It is unrivaled in glass content, hardness, anti-dirt power and durability in the Pika Pika Rain Ceramic Coating series.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain X210
fields.description: 3 yrs durability. Pika Pika Rain X210 Ceramic Coating forms a 100% genuine-glass coating [ ceramic coating ] on your car body by reacting with moisture in the air. Once cured, the glass layer protects the car body for up to 3 years. The glass coating [ ceramic coating ] layer produces a luxurious gloss and provides excellent water repellency on your car body.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain PREMIUM KIT Ceramic Coating
fields.description: 3 yrs durability. Pika Pika Rain Premium Ceramic Coating forms a 100% genuine-glass coating [ ceramic coating ] on your car body by reacting with moisture in the air. Once cured, the glass layer protects the car body for up to 3 years. The glass coating [ ceramic coating ] layer produces a luxurious gloss and provides excellent water repellency on your car body.

fields.name: Soft99 King of Gloss
fields.description: The dark version makes both darker-coloured finishes and mid-tone colours look slightly darker (almost like a mild tinting effect), while the light version makes lighter-coloured finishes look brighter. To achieve unparalleled levels of gloss and durability, simply apply SOFT99 King of Gloss over a basecoat of SOFT99 Fusso Coat Wax.

fields.name: CC Wax Gold
fields.description: Prostaff CC Wax Gold car wax is a car wax that provides a glossy finish to your paintwork and contains natural carnauba and quartz leaving a hydrophobic finish. The CC Water series is categorised into four different classes, the higher the level of class the better as it provides better gloss, water-dropping effect, the smoothness of the paint and durability.

fields.name: Soft99 Fusso Light
fields.description: Wax which creates hydrophobic and protective coating durable for up to 12 months. Thanks to unique fluoropolymers, the coating effectively reduces adhesion of dirt and repels water. The paint is protected against negative effects of weather conditions such as acid rain, UV radiation and road salt. The product is dedicated to dark coloured paintwork.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 1
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-H adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophobic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 2
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-S adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophilic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 3
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-K adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophilic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 2
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-S adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophilic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Shampoo
fields.description: Pika Pika Rain Car Shampoo is perfect for Pika Pika Rain glass coated cars. This special shampoo contains ingredients made from a premium formula to remove dirt and grime, without harming the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] layer. Also Pika Pika Rain Car Shampoo is powerful enough to clean your car, and prevents unnecessary bubbling so it is easy to rinse off and use less water.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Oil Remover
fields.description: It is perfect preparation for Pika Pika Rain Ceramic Coating!Car wash by normal shampoo cannot remove strongly oily dirt.Oily dirt prevents ceramic coating curing evenly on the surface of the car body. Ceramic coat over the dirt might come off the surface in the worst case.Pika Pika Rain Oil Remover (Degreaser) is the perfect preparation for Pika Pika Rain Ceramic Coating as it can remove extra oily substances and fit Pika Pika Rain Ceramic Coating to the car body securely.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Wheel Brush
fields.description: Fake sheep skin is easy to burn due to chemical fiber. Therefore, it is weak to heat and it is nondurable.Pika Pika Rain Wheel Brush is made of REAL Australian sheep skin. It is high water retaining capacity and nice absorption oil stain, so you can clean up every gap in wheels.It is made to hold and use easily.For washing wide parts, you can hold it horizontal, and the other hand, for washing narrow parts, you can hold it vertical.Pika Pika Rain Wheel Brush doesn’t drag sands and dirt like a sponge on the surface of wheels, so it can wash wheels gently and can make less scratches..

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Microfibre Drying Cloth
fields.description: Pika Pika Rain Microfiber Chamois is 40 cm × 75 cm. It is larger than general chamois, so you can use it for not only car washing but also wiping. Also it can be cut to the size you want.General synthetic chamois hardens once it's dried due to its material property and we have to be careful to handle it.Pika Pika Rain Microfiber Chamois is made of absorbent urethane which has finely raised microfiber over the surface. It is like a tough and soft deer skin (buckskin treatment).As it has never hardened even if it's completely dried, you don’t have to soften it again by plenty of water.It is not deteriorated by repeated drying process in the long term use.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Polishing Compound
fields.description: Blended to prevent burning in by our own technology. It does not contain extra oil for glossing over scratches. Anyone can apply Pika Pika Rain Liquid Compound easily without fail. Fine for removing scratches, defects, acid rain and swirls or holograms and old coating.Ultra-fine abrasives leave a mirror finishing and make the surface in great condition before Pika Pika Rain Ceramic Coating products application..

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Plush   MicroFibre Cloth
fields.description: Pika Pika Rain Microfiber Cloth is the perfect detailing cloth to use with Pika Pika Rain products. Pika Pika Rain Microfiber Cloth is made from rich microfiber and helps you spread the coating agent thinly and evenly for an excellent finish! The microfiber cloth can also be used to wash and dry your car. Additionally, this rich microfiber cloth minimizes any scratches caused by washing.

fields.name: Hikari Leather Cleaner
fields.description: Leather is a natural product, in order to maintain the beauty of your upholstery it requires regular cleaning, which if neglected, may cause deterioration. But as leather is a natural material, it is essential to maintain your upholstery using only natural products. HIKARI LEATHER CLEANER doesn’t contain any abrasive detergents, furniture polish and solvents, petrol, gasoline white spirits, etc. HIKARI LEATHER CLEANER gives and keeps your LEATHER Interior IMPRESSIVE APPEARANCE and doesn’t lead to the leather deterioration.

fields.name: Hikari Leather Cleaner
fields.description: First in the Industry! Self-Foaming Micro Bubble Wash. We are proud to present our high quality micro bubble wash designed to be used on coatings. The bubble wash can be used on all colors of coating.

fields.name: Soft99 Fabric Cleaner
fields.description: Combining deep anti-bacterial cleaning ability with deodorizing agents, this aerosol is convenient for cleaning fabric seats, child seats, and floor mats.
